content.text: Hi there! how is your evening going?
Hey! It's going pretty good! I'm just relaxing after a long day at work.
What kind of work do you do?
I work for IBM in Chicago, as a software engineer.
Oh, that's awesome! I'm a software engineer too. I work for Google in Seattle.
That's cool! I actually just moved from Seattle to Chicago for my job.
Oh, wow! What made you move?
I wanted a change of scenery, and I also wanted to be closer to my family.
That makes sense. I'm originally from Michigan, so I know how you feel about wanting to be close to family.
Yeah, I miss my family a lot. But I'm glad I made the move.
I'm glad to hear that! What are some of your favorite things to do in Chicago?
I love going to the museums and the art galleries. I also love going to concerts and sporting events.
Those sound like fun things to do! I'm not really into sports, but I love going to concerts and art galleries.
We should go to a concert together sometime!
That would be fun! I'll let you know when I'm free.
